product_name: Patagonia Baby Micro D Long Underwear Bottoms - Toddler Girls' - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The Patagonia Baby Micro D Long Underwear bottoms for infants and toddlers feature soft fabric and ample warmth for pudgy little legs. Colorful, quick-drying microfiber polyester fleece is warm and insulates even when wet. Fold-over elasticized waistband comfortably seals in warmth; self-fabric cuffs keep pants from hiking up. Flatseam construction is soft and non-chafing next to skin. Closeout.
short_description: The Patagonia Baby Micro D Long Underwear bottoms for infants and toddlers feature soft fabric and ample warmth for pudgy little legs.
